title: Lifestyle
description: Explore new hobbies or brighten up your existing ones — your way. Browse engaging online courses in cooking, acrylic painting, dancing, dog training, sketching, and more. Learn 1-on-1 with dedicated tutors for individual approach and faster results. Or check out real-life stories on lifestyle-related topics.

about.title: More about Lifestyle
content: Explore the collection of high-quality content in Lifestyle to find new hobbies and make your life brighter. Watch engaging masterclasses taught by dedicated professionals to get a fresh look at lifestyle opportunities. Learn how to dance, paint a cute fox, or release stress creating craft pins.
We got you covered with great content and 1-on-1 tutors to help you absorb new skills in a variety of topics in lifestyle — be that painting, dancing, handcrafts, time management, or anything else.
The lifestyle category is designed for everyone who wants to find a new hobby, spend time with pleasure, and change the routine by welcoming new skills to their life.
